summary: Sparks fly when an engaged country music singer reconnects with a childhood friend.
cast: Jesse Metcalfe|Autumn Reeser|Laura Mennell|Aaron Craven|Hrothgar Mathews|Lauren Holly|Peter Bryant|Joseph Allan Sutherland|Lydia Campbell|Julie Lynn Mortensen|Kevin Mundy|Sebastien Archibald|Amy Reid|Briana Buckmaster|Ken Godmere|Sarah Hayward|Farryn VanHumbeck|Will Verchere-Gopaulsingh|William Lawrenson|Robert Lawrenson|Stefan Burzan
title: A Country Wedding
